publication_info.publication_description:
I have a class C RV that has been converted to a toy hauler.  This has the legendary 7.3 L diesel.  Mechanically it's great! It's spent its life for the most part in Southern California. ￼ the drop-down door in the back was done by a previous owner but he seems to have done a pretty good job of it.  He obviously used it as a work truck. I was going to use it for my motorcycle trips.  The interior will need at least a partial renovation. The front portion is not too bad, but the cargo area needs work. As well as the bathroom.  ￼ I bought this with the intention to renovate it myself but I lost my job and my plans have changed. It needs a lot of cleaning and a lot of interior work. It is currently in storage in Wood River Illinois.  Please don't waste my time though. I tried to take photos so you can see its condition. If you're really interested I'm about 35 minutes away and can meet you at the storage lot.￼

If the ad is up, it is available so please only contact me to see ￼ See less
